divs: Sighting Detailsmy husband went outside & saw the lights then went inside & got the camera & was able to get a short video before it just disapeared. We live on top of a hill in the hill country. The nights are always bright & you can see galaxy clusters & trillions of stars, this night was unusualy dark. We also have milatary jets that fly over us frequently. I would love to get an explaination of this if you can. Thank you for your time
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bandera

This sighting has never been favorited.
